# destinationType

**Instance Property**

The type of call to place.

## Declaration

```swift
var destinationType: INCallDestinationType { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to differentiate regular calls from specialized types of calls. For example, when the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCallDestinationType/voicemailDestination], the user is attempting to connect to their voicemail messages.

## Getting the Call Attributes

- **contacts**: The users to call.
